arts.ttl: PSG identify possible Gianluigi Donnarumma replacement following concerning performances
arts.sum: PSG are concerned with their goalkeeping options and have therefore identified Manchester City’s Ederson as a possible transfer target. Luis Enrique has three senior goalkeepers among his options including Italy international Gianluigi Donnarumma.
